body.para: To restore the ATC to standby position manually during an abnormal stoppage requires understanding of the ATC operation sequence. To facilitate ease of operation, an Auto Recovery function is available for the operator.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Observe the following conditions before doing the ATC maintenance operation.

list.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;
li.text: Ensure the ATC arm and the ATC magazine are in stop condition.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;
li.text: Ensure all the feed axes (X, Y, Z, 4, 5) are in the safe position.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;

text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;
li.text: Release ATC Manual Intervention mode on the ATC operation panel.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;
li.text: Release the Tool Call mode on the Tool Data Management screen.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:-12px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:37px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:37px left,56px left ;
li.text: soft key on the ATC Maintenance screen.
